content: उपसद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sit near to, go near, approach; उपसेदुर्दशग्रीवं <ls>Bk. 9. 92</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">3. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">6. 135.</ls> {@--2@} To sit at the feet of; उपाध्यायमुपासदं <ls>Ks. 108. 21.</ls> {@--3@} To wait upon, serve; (तं) आकल्पसाधनैस्तैस्तैरुपसेदुः प्रसाधकाः <ls>R. 17. 22</ls>; <ls>Śi. 13. 24.</ls> {@--4@} To march against. {@--5@} To try to get or obtain. {@--6@} To sink down. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To place near. {@--2@} To lead towards. {@--3@} To get, find.

उपसद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Serving, waiting upon {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Siege, assault, attack. {@--2@} Laying up, accumulating. {@--3@} Service, worship. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a ceremony, forming part of the ज्योतिष्टोम ceremony, and lasting for several days.
